price: 28. Zij zullen zeggen: “Waarlijk, jullie benaderden ons van de rechterkant” (jullie hielden ons af van de waarheid).
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
